translations: adj.不爱交际的；不与人亲近的；不和气的

phrs.translation: 不善于社交的, 不好社交的, 不擅社交的, 性格孤僻

sentences.sentence: My marriage has broken up. It has made me reclusive and unsociable.
sentences.translation: 我的婚姻解体了。这使我隐居起来，不爱交际。

sentences.sentence: So, he finishes his life as a very unsociable old man. (laughs).
sentences.translation: 所以，临死时他也只是一个孤僻的怪老头(笑)。

sentences.sentence: This child became unsociable because his parent's got a divorce.
sentences.translation: 这个孩子因为父母离婚而变得性格孤僻。
